codes.ADVC: Advice indicates where the sender informs the receiver of an activity that has been taken that requires a response.
codes.BNTF: Notification to initiate the transfer of a batch (no response expected).
codes.BTRQ: Request to initiate the transfer of a batch (response expected).
codes.CAAD: Advice about the capture of an activity already performed (response expected).
codes.CANO: Notification about the capture of an activity already performed (no response expected).
codes.CLNF: Notification to initiate the transfer of a collection (no response expected).
codes.CLRQ: Request to initiate the transfer of a collection (response expected).
codes.ERNO: Notification of a message containing errors.
codes.INSN: Informs of an action to be taken.
codes.STAD: Advice about the status of a transaction.
codes.STNO: Notification about the status of a transaction.

description: Code to identify the type of process related to the message, as published separately in a message function external code set.
name: ExternalMessageFunction1Code
